name: Not Quite a Tower Defense
description:
Not Quite a Tower Defense is a game about defending a core while you, the player, uses a variety of characters A CUBE WITH GUNS and find ways to defend it.

You have a Drone which aims to help you fighting enemies and two AMAZING weapons.

You may control the Drone with Q and shoot with your both mouse buttons.

don't tell anyone I said this, but you can take a sneak peek at the turrets by pressing E!

It features:

  • Cheap Cubes
  • ...turrets? (WIP)
  • CRISPY PIXELS!!1!
  • cute particles!
  • Waves

To-do list:

  • Extra characters
  • more waves
  • actual finished turrets
  • Different maps
  • More enemies
  • some tech related blahblahblah
  • roguelite elements!

Still in development, feel free to test it!
